page.title: 10PILGRIMS HATCH
page.content: 82% of the population in Pilgrims Hatch enjoy living there because it is near to the countryside and Brentwood. It is near the shopping centres of Harlow,Basildon,Romford and Chelmsford which can only be reached by car.Pilgrims Hatch doesn't have many facilities for young people e.g.discos and youth clubs .There is no doctor,dentist or chemist.There are many complaints to the council about the lack of repairs on the council houses.The bus service is poor for some areas and the fares are too high.e.g.38p to Brentwood from the centre of Pilgrims Hatch.There are too few evening and weekend buses.many people enjoy using the local squash courts and swimming pool.Old people think that prices at local shops are too high.
